name: Stayhome Simulator
description:
Stayhome Simulator will teach you how to stay home, go to the store, use a mask and various antiseptics

Unique features


  • A lot of Items
  • Atmospheric Musical Accompaniment
  • A Wide Range Of Unique Activities
  • 10+ Locations with the ability to Improve your Room
  • 20+ Unique Heroes

With Amazing Soundtrack, you can fully immerse yourself in the Atmosphere of This Game.

A large Assortment of items needed During the Epidemic: Food, Toilet Paper, Air Freshener, VR Glasses, Flour and Much More...

A Great Game, to Relax after a Hard Day at the Factory
